snippet: William A. Ackman and his lobbying effort to bring down Herbalife. | Documents point to mortgage lapses at Credit Suisse. | A judge rules against R.B.C. over the lender’s advice in a 2011 buyout. | Bankers go to great lengths to get credit for...
abstract: William A. Ackman and his lobbying effort to bring down Herbalife. | Documents point to mortgage lapses at Credit Suisse. | A judge rules against R.B.C. over the lender’s advice in a 2011 buyout. | Bankers go to great lengths to get credit for deals, even if they did not advise on them.

headline.main: Ackman's Battle to Bring Down Herbalife
